Node.definition: = a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

Node.gloss: to lie with > to sleep with|to have sex with
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with or next to someone; hence: = action by which humans have sexual relations with other humans or animals

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= armed conflict in which weapons are used to attack an enemy
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to be split|to be cleft|to be breached|to be cracked|to be ripped open|to be rent|to burst asunder
Node.definition: = process by which an object is split, either partially or completely, either by supernatural means or by violence
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈ regarded as beautiful and associated with well being
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= process by which an object moves away from its location
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
literally: to touch; hence: = state in which an animate object is in contact with another object
= a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= location
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man, also known as Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ◄ son of Amaziah (אֲמַצְיָהוּ) tribe of Judah; ► father of Jotham (יֹותָם) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally; holy one; hence: = supernatural being in the service of God

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= fire; ► used for burning sacrifices and other objects, setting fire to arrows, and warming oneself; ≈ associated with light, warmth, and destruction|= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
read וקרות (קֹר)|= state in which the atmosphere has a relatively low temperature
= process in which the sky gradually clouds over ► and diminishes the intensity of the light|= process in which water becomes ice ◄ as a result of low temperatures ► and so stops flowing

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to come out (of a certain place); hence: = process by which liquids flow from a certain place
= state in which objects have recently attained a particular state
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them
literally: the eastern sea; hence: = Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
literally: the sea behind; hence: = Mediterranean Sea

= hot season of the year, opposite of חֹרֶף (חֹרֶף) ► time when most crops are harvested and preparations are made for the cold season; ≈ sometimes associated with excessive heat and drought, and also with hard work
= cold season of the year; also time of plowing; opposite of קַיִץ (קַיִץ) ≈ sometimes associated with hard work
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which an object becomes significantly different

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= town, possibly to be identified with Gibeah (גִּבְעָה) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► given to Levites; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= town; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון)
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which an object is located in a high position
= state in which an object has been placed in a certain location with the intention that it will stay there for an extended period of time
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= tower; ◄ located in Jerusalem at the northwestern corner of the wall surrounding the Temple Mount
= tower ◄ in Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= a basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a trough or vat; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= event during which people are killed and their possessions destroyed
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
denominative of צָבָא (צָבָא) = action by which humans engage in warfare
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= causative action by which deities cause parts of the human body start decomposing
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= process by which wounds or parts of the human body decompose
= empty, open place ◄ in a solid body
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= process by which wounds or parts of the human body decompose
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans are shaken out of a state of complacency and routine, ◄ as a result of a certain event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
literally: (one's) hand goes up (against someone else's hand); hence: = action by which one human behaves aggressively toward another

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= generic designation for any article of clothing
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

= male or female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; ► used for riding and as pack animals; ≈ associated with a lack of understanding

= large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people
= state in which humans, animals, plants, or objects remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
expression indicating that a certain event is repeated every year
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to hold a festival|to hold a feast
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans hold a celebration, usually of a religious nature, involving animal sacrifices; ≈ associated with joy

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= water that has fallen as rain
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

Node.gloss: to hold a festival|to hold a feast
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans hold a celebration, usually of a religious nature, involving animal sacrifices; ≈ associated with joy

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
= process by which a human being receives the treatment that is the consequence of a wrongful act that s/he has committed
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= process by which a human being receives the treatment that is the consequence of a wrongful act that s/he has committed

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

Node.gloss: to hold a festival|to hold a feast
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans hold a celebration, usually of a religious nature, involving animal sacrifices; ≈ associated with joy

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= metal container large enough to dip in with one's hands; ► used for sprinkling liquids such as water and blood
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= a person engaging in commerce and trade

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
